components.label: HTML
components.content:
Your welcome page features helpful links which will allow you to
start an application and manage your loan.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
If you require assistance, visit this page for quick access to the
StudentAid BC Help Centre.

components.label: HTML
components.content: Text will go here about starting your application using the button provided.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
In order to manage your loan, please visit the 
National Student Loan Service Centre (NSLSC).

components.label: HTML
components.content: For further information, please refer to the StudentAid BC Help Centre.
